description:
A comfy cotton tee that feels good, and you can feel good about. Not only does this tee plant trees, it also helps protect the soil its cotton was grown in.

  • ROC™ cotton aims to rehabilitate soil, respect animal welfare and improve the lives of farmers. ROC farms reduce greenhouse gas emissions and could help trap more carbon than conventional agriculture
  • Cotton wears well and feels great
  • tentree’s goal is to construct quality apparel and ensure that ten trees are planted for every article of clothing sold
name: tentree Regenerative Line Graphic T-Shirt - Women's
